text: My pages are using Featured Images but the Search Results are not displaying the Featured Image. Should the Search Results core module be showing the Featured Images or is there code we need to add? Thanks.
This is for the Site Search within the website. I did get the Featured Images to display but only by not using this if/else line in the Search Results module: {% if module.display_featured_images %}

Looks like I missed that there is a boolean that is by default set to false for displaying a featured image. I needed to add display_featured_image="true" to my module hubl code in my Search Results template.
